Comments_List: Shakespeare analysis in a theoretical context!
Deeper knowledge of Shakespeare and of literature in general. Deeper knowledge of humanity.
Prof. Bloom is a true intellectual and an incredible mentor. He is a genuinely kind man who takes a real interest in his students, and his insights border on the prophetic.

Honestly, the course is greatly inhibited by the Skype component. It would be greatly improved by either allowing Professor Bloom to hold class in his house or bringing him to a location the students can meet him.
Some of the greatest texts in human history. No weaknesses.

You should take Professor Bloom if you have the chance, which is probably all that has to be said. However, although it's uniquely wonderful to watch such a brilliant brain at work, the class was not a super positive experience. Your comments aren't really heard, the technology gave us frequent difficulties, and there wasn't really an overarching path of the class.
I mean, its Harold Bloom teaching Shakespeare. Its hard to pass up.
not if you REALLY want to learn shakespeare. if you want to just hear from bloom, it's fine
Absolutely. We read great works by the greatest English poet, and discuss them intensely and seriously.
